page.title: 15TRANSPORT in WELWYN G.C.
page.content: {Cars}and light vans provide a large part of the transport but{buses,taxis, {bicycles}and{trains}are also used. Nearly 70% of local residents own a car and most claim it to be medium or large. Most are powered by petrol. A small number use more than one car. Car owners use the car for nearly all journeys. Many people questioned use the buses but think the service not very good. Taxis are not frequently used by those we asked but most think the service is important. Only a few use the trains often but about half use them sometimes. A significant number, mainly the younger ones, use bicycles. Local travel is often{on foot.}
